com.conceptwave.scripting
Class TableState

com.conceptwave.scripting.Object
  com.conceptwave.scripting.CWScriptable
      com.conceptwave.scripting.TableState

public class TableState
extends CWScriptable

Scriptable object to parse, modify and serialize JSON table state of the table component through scripts.

Constructor Summary
TableState(String stateString)
          Creates a new TableState object and loads state from stateString parameter if specified

 String getFieldName(com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer index)
          Gets column name at the specified index.
NOTE: the index is the index of the column state in the TableState object, can be different from the actual column index in table (according to sort order)

          Gets total number of the column states in the object

          Gets sorting direction (true for ascending) at the specified index

          Gets name of the sorting column at the specified index
 String getWidth(String name)
          Gets column width
 com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean hasField(String name)
          Return true if the object has state for the column
 com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean isVisible(String name)
          Return true if the specified column is visible.
Note: if a table column does not have state in the object it will be considered as visible.

          Removes column state from the object
